description: Soft coconut crepes sprinkled with poppy seeds and coconut flakes make a perfect festive treat. Serve with caramel sauce for ultimate indulgence.
name: Saat Padhar Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine plain flour, rice flour and baking powder and sift into a large bowl. Gradually stir in coconut milk until mixture is smooth and combined.
Using an electric mixer, beat eggs and sugar in a large bowl until pale. Fold egg mixture into coconut mixture. Add salt and fold until combined. Set aside for 10 minutes to rest.

Lightly brush a crepe pan or medium non-stick frying pan with some ghee. Place over medium heat. For each crepe, pour cup of batter into the pan, tilting to cover the base. Cook for 1 minute or until bubbles start to appear on the surface of the crepe.

Sprinkle crepe with some poppy seeds and coconut. Using a spatula, carefully loosen the edge of crepe from pan, then roll crepe up in pan. Transfer to a platter. Repeat with remaining ghee, batter, poppy seeds and coconut to make 16 crepes in total. Serve with caramel sauce.
